1 - layer linear setting.from sentence: The 1 - layer linear setting performs the best and is therefore reported in .

seems to be.from sentence: Using ReLU seems to be worse than nonlinear FC layers .

character and syntactic embeddings.from sentence: In , we explore the utility of using character and syntactic embeddings , which we found to have helped CAFE marginally .

inter-attention alignment features.from sentence: In ( 4 ) , we remove the inter-attention alignment features , which naturally impact the model performance significantly .

both highway layers.from sentence: We observe that both highway layers have marginally helped the over all performance .

Sub and Concat compositions.from sentence: We observe that the Sub and Concat compositions were more important than the Mul composition .

LSTM encoder.from sentence: Finally , in ( 10 ) , we replace the LSTM encoder with a BiLSTM , observing that adding bi-directionality did not improve performance for our model .
